prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a bright yellow body and a fluffy tail.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon that has striking black and yellow stripes.
Show me a Pokemon with a round body and a cheerful expression, ideal for battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that is primarily yellow but has accents of red and black.
Design a friendly electric Pokemon that loves to roam in forests and grasslands.
Make a Pokemon that evolves from a small creature into a larger, more powerful version.
Give me a Pokemon that is known for its speed and agility in combat.
